name: It's Like They Knew...
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 50!

You play as a cheerio stuck in the desert, or something.

You "plan" out your route (By platforming using arrow keys or WASD), then replay the level, but this time stuck on rail. The only controls you have to stop you running into those pesky red things are space which will stop you on the path (you delay the inevitable...) (The theme for people not doing the thing).

Let me know what ya'll think, and happy birthday Ludum Dare!
